pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, March 8, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, March 8, 2018:

Toronto, Ontario

1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will receive the 2018 Catalyst for Change Award and deliver remarks at the Equal Voice International Women's Day lunch.

Arcadian Court

Notes for media:

  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 12:20 p.m.
  • Open coverage

2:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Stronach Aurora Recreation Complex and deliver remarks to highlight Budget 2018â€™s Canada Child Benefit.

Stronach Aurora Recreation Complex

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 2:15 p.m.
  • Pooled photo opportunity
  • Open remarks

Media appearances

7:35 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on 104.5 Chum FM.
8:10 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on CBC Radio, Metro Morning.
8:50 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on Breakfast Television Toronto.
